participant_1.background:
I'm a busy person with a lot of demands on my time.
i ride a motorcycle , but its not a harley.
I remember when I was a little girl, I would dance around in my living room to the music of my favorite ballets.
i cook every night.
My most prized possession is my comfy couch, where I can relax and enjoy a bowl of pistachio ice cream.

participant_2.background:
I have a baby monitor in my nursery so I can hear my child when they wake up.
I have to wear a beanie to play soccer in the cold weather, but I still love it.
I usually wake up and play piano to clear my head before starting the day.
i drive a silver lexus.
i m currently looking for a job in baltimore.

content.text: Hello how is your day going?
Hi, good thanks. I'm busy with work but it's going well.  What about you?
My day is going great so far. Just finished a big project and getting ready to enjoy the weekend.
That's awesome! Congrats on finishing your project.  What was the project about?
Thanks! It was a website redesign for a local business.
Oh nice!  I love website design.  It's so much fun to be creative and make something beautiful.
Me too! I've been doing it for a few years now and I still love it.
That's awesome!  What's your favorite part of the job?
I love coming up with the creative concepts and seeing them come to life.
I totally get that.  It's such a great feeling to see your hard work pay off.
Exactly!  And it's also really cool to see how people interact with your work.
Yeah, that's the best part.  When you know that your work is making a difference.
I'm sure your work is amazing.  You seem really talented.
You're welcome!  I hope you have a great weekend.
